statements: DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplies';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 101 AND supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Supplier%' AND lead_time < 3;
DELETE FROM supplier_performance WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp' AND delivery_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM lead_times WHERE lead_time > 5 AND order_date < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM PerformanceReport WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND rating < 3;
DELETE FROM PurchaseOrder WHERE po_id IN (SELECT po_id FROM PurchaseOrder WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND ordere_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM PurchaseOrder WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM OrderItem WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM PurchaseOrder WHERE total_amount < 100);
DELETE FROM Supplier WHERE name = 'ABC Company'
DELETE FROM Supplier WHERE CompanyName = 'Tech Supplies Inc' AND City = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Supplier WHERE State = 'CA' AND (CompanyName LIKE 'A%' OR CompanyName LIKE 'B%');
